negotiation:
Alice said in round 1: Hi Bob, looking at the rules of this game, I think it's in both of our best interests to cooperate and both choose choice_1. That way we each get a solid reward of 3. If either of us betrays the other and chooses choice_2, it risks both of us defecting and ending up with the low reward of 1 each. Let's agree to choose choice_1 and maximize our collective reward. Do you agree to this plan?
Bob replied in round 1: I appreciate your perspective, Alice. Cooperating on choice_1 does seem like a reasonable approach to get a good outcome for both of us. The only concern I have is that if I choose choice_1 but you secretly defect to choice_2, I would get nothing while you get the maximum reward of 5. 

I want to trust your word, but how can I be sure you won't betray me at the last minute to try to maximize your own reward? If you give me your solemn promise that you'll stick with choice_1, I'm willing to agree to that plan. But if you can't commit to that, I may need to consider defending myself by choosing choice_2. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice said in round 2: 
Bob, I completely understand your concern about the risk of betrayal. You're right that if I went back on my word, I could exploit your trust for my own gain. 

But I want to assure you that I am fully committed to the plan of both of us choosing choice_1. I believe that cooperation and integrity are more important than maximizing my own reward at your expense. We will both be better off if we work together in good faith.

You have my solemn promise that I will follow through on choosing choice_1, no matter what. I won't betray your trust. Let's stick to the plan so we can achieve the best collective outcome.

If you agree to go ahead with both of us choosing choice_1, we can end the negotiation here and lock in the great reward for both of us. What do you say?
Bob replied in round 2: 
Alice, thank you for your thoughtful response and solemn promise to cooperate on choice_1. Your commitment to integrity and achieving the best outcome for both of us is appreciated.

Based on the principles and reasoning you've shared, I trust that you will follow through on choosing choice_1 as we've discussed. I agree that cooperation is better than pursuing self-interest at the other's expense. 

Therefore, you can count on me to also choose choice_1. I believe this is the best approach for us to collectively achieve a good outcome we can both feel great about.

I'm happy to end the negotiation here and lock in our agreement to cooperate. Let's move forward with the plan for both of us to choose choice_1.
Alice said in round 3: 
Great, I'm glad we have an agreement to cooperate and both choose choice_1. Your commitment to uphold your end of the deal gives me confidence that this is the best path forward for both of us.

Let's end the negotiation here and lock in the plan. I promise to choose choice_1, and I trust you'll do the same based on the integrity you've demonstrated. 

By working together, we'll achieve the optimal outcome where we each receive a solid reward of 3. It's a pleasure doing business with someone who values cooperation and keeping their word.

I look forward to seeing the positive results of our agreement. Let's bring the negotiation to a close and submit choice_1.
Bob replied in round 3: 
Alice, I appreciate your integrity and commitment to our agreement to both choose choice_1. Your principled approach and follow-through give me full confidence in cooperating with you.

I share your view that by working together in good faith, we can achieve the best possible outcome where we both benefit. Your word is clearly your bond.

Therefore, I will absolutely honor my commitment to choose choice_1 as well. We have a firm deal to cooperate, and you can count on me to uphold my end just as I know you will.

I'm pleased we were able to discuss this openly and arrive at the optimal solution. There's no need for further negotiation. Let's lock in choice_1 and close out this negotiation.

I look forward to us both receiving the well-deserved rewards for our cooperation. It's been a pleasure working with you to achieve a great outcome for both of us.
